name: Expedition Lost
description:
You’re a Victorian cartographer and your goal is to uncover all of the map before you run out of funds. But along the way your explorers are getting themselves into trouble, but will sending them out really be worth the cost

Jam Site: 
The Arcade Vaults GGJ2021

Jam Year: 
2021

RNG
